type:milestone.description: Central tracking issue for a sprint

epics.title: Sprint 1: Foundation
epics.body:
**Goal**: Establish monorepo, bot basics, Convex schema, and dev tunnel.

**Target**: Day 1-2

**Acceptance**: Bot /start works, Mini App opens in Telegram, user persisted in Convex.

tasks.title: Initialize pnpm + turborepo monorepo
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Set up the project structure.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- pnpm workspace configured
- turborepo for build orchestration
- `apps/bot`, `apps/web`, `convex/` directories created
- `.env.example` with required variables

tasks.title: Implement /start handler with Mini App button
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Users can start the bot and open the Mini App.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `/start` sends greeting message
- Inline button opens Mini App URL
- Bot runs in polling mode locally

tasks.title: Implement /admin slash command
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Admins can toggle admin mode.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `/admin` command toggles admin state for user
- State persisted (can be in-memory for PoC)
- Response confirms mode change

tasks.title: Create Vite + React Router Mini App shell
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Mini App foundation with routing.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Vite + React + TypeScript setup
- React Router with routes: `/`, `/user`, `/admin`, `/orgs`, `/get-eligible`
- Telegram WebApp SDK integrated
- Basic diagnostics drawer component

tasks.title: Set up Cloudflare quick tunnel for dev
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Mini App accessible from Telegram during dev.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `cloudflared tunnel` runs locally
- Mini App URL works in Telegram
- Documented in README

tasks.title: Define Convex schema with orgs layer
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Data model ready for all features.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Tables: `users`, `addresses`, `orgs`, `channels`, `gates`, `memberships`, `events`
- Schema deployed to Convex
- Basic queries/mutations scaffolded

tasks.title: Implement initData HMAC validation
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Security-critical - only trust Telegram-signed identity.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Convex action validates initData HMAC
- Rejects invalid/expired data
- Returns user info on success
- Unit tests for happy/unhappy paths

tasks.title: Create validateAndUpsertUser mutation
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Users persisted on Mini App open.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Mutation upserts user from validated initData
- Stores telegramUserId, username, names
- Returns user record

tasks.title: Evaluate ETH Identity Kit for ENS/SIWE
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Decide if ETH Identity Kit simplifies our flow.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Install `ethereum-identity-kit` in apps/web
- Test ENS resolution components
- Test SIWE integration
- Document decision: adopt or use RainbowKit/wagmi

epics.title: Sprint 2: User Identity
epics.body:
**Goal**: Wallet connection, SIWE verification, ENS identity, multi-address table.

**Target**: Day 3

**Acceptance**: User can connect wallet, verify ownership via SIWE, see ENS identity, manage multiple addresses.

tasks.title: Set up wagmi + viem with MetaMask connector
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Users can connect wallet in Mini App.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- wagmi + viem configured
- MetaMask connector working
- Connection state persisted
- Works in Telegram webview

tasks.title: Deploy $BEST token on Base + Arc mainnets
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Demo token available for testing.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- ERC-20 token deployed on Base mainnet
- ERC-20 token deployed on Arc mainnet
- Token addresses documented
- Faucet function for claiming

tasks.title: Create faucet UI for claiming tokens
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Users can claim 2026 $BEST tokens.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Faucet page in Mini App
- Claim 2026 tokens (once per wallet)
- User pays gas
- "Add to wallet" button (EIP-747)
- Gold medal SVG icon for token

tasks.title: Generate SIWE nonce in Convex
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Secure nonce for SIWE signing.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Convex action generates one-time nonce
- Nonce stored with TTL
- Replay protection enforced

tasks.title: Verify SIWE signature and bind wallet
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Prove wallet ownership.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Convex action verifies SIWE message + signature
- Recovers address, validates nonce/domain
- Creates `addresses` record with `verified` status
- Stores `verifiedAt` timestamp

tasks.title: Resolve ENS name + avatar for addresses
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Show ENS identity in UI.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Resolve ENS name for verified addresses
- Fetch ENS avatar
- Display in user profile
- Cache results appropriately

tasks.title: Create multi-address table UI
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Users manage multiple wallets.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Table shows 3 addresses
- Status: verified ✅ / pending ⏳
- "Default address" radio button
- Changing default updates displayed ENS
- "Verify ownership" button for pending

tasks.title: Store default address preference
tasks.body:
**Goal**: User's favorite ENS identity.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `users.defaultAddressId` field
- Mutation to update default
- UI reflects current default
- ENS identity follows default

epics.title: Sprint 3: Admin + Gates
epics.body:
**Goal**: Admin org onboarding, gate configuration, token metadata fetching.

**Target**: Day 3-4

**Acceptance**: Admin can create org, add channels, configure token gate with threshold.

tasks.title: Show admin UI when /admin toggled
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Admin mode in Mini App.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Mini App detects admin mode
- Shows admin-specific navigation
- Redirects to /admin or /orgs

tasks.title: Create org list view with add button
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Admin sees their organizations.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `/orgs` route shows org list
- "+ Add Organization" button
- Empty state for new admins

tasks.title: Org creation flow
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Admin onboards new org.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Form: org name
- Select channels from list
- Instructions to add bot as admin
- "Check Done" button verifies bot permissions

tasks.title: Verify bot admin rights in channel
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Confirm bot can manage members.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Bot checks `can_restrict_members` permission
- Stores `channels.botIsAdmin` flag
- Returns verification status to Mini App

tasks.title: Gate configuration form UI
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Admin sets token gate rules.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Form fields: token address, chain dropdown, threshold
- Chain dropdown shows 25+ chains
- Loading state while fetching metadata
- Error handling for invalid addresses

tasks.title: Fetch token metadata from chain
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Auto-populate token info.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Fetch `symbol()`, `name()`, `decimals()` via viem
- Display in form after paste
- Handle errors gracefully
- Store in gate config

tasks.title: Save gate config to Convex
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Persist gate rules.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Mutation saves to `gates` table
- Links to org and channel
- Stores chainId, tokenAddress, threshold, decimals
- Success confirmation in UI

epics.title: Sprint 4: Eligibility + LiFi
epics.body:
**Goal**: Check eligibility across wallets, LiFi widget for cross-chain recovery.

**Target**: Day 4

**Acceptance**: User can check eligibility, see deficit, use LiFi to swap/bridge to required token.

tasks.title: Fetch token balance for verified wallets
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Read on-chain balances.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Convex action fetches balanceOf via RPC
- Checks all verified addresses for user
- Returns total balance across wallets

tasks.title: Create eligibility check mutation
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Compare balance to threshold.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Sum balances across verified wallets
- Compare against gate threshold
- Return eligible/ineligible status
- Include current balance and deficit

tasks.title: Check Eligibility button and result UI
tasks.body:
**Goal**: User sees eligibility status.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- "Check Eligibility" button on user page
- Shows: eligible ✅ or ineligible ❌
- Displays current balance vs required
- "Get Eligible" CTA if ineligible

tasks.title: Install and configure LiFi Widget SDK
tasks.body:
**Goal**: LiFi widget ready for integration.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- LiFi Widget SDK installed
- Basic widget renders
- Wallet connection works with existing wagmi setup

tasks.title: Create /get-eligible page with LiFi widget
tasks.body:
**Goal**: User can swap to required token.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `/get-eligible` route
- LiFi widget pre-configured with:
  - Destination chain = gate's chain
  - Destination token = gate token ($BEST)
  - Amount = threshold - currentBalance + buffer
- Cross-chain: USDC on Arbitrum → BEST on Base

tasks.title: Re-check eligibility after swap
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Confirm user is now eligible.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- "Re-check Eligibility" button after swap
- Fetches fresh balance
- Shows updated status
- Success message if now eligible

tasks.title: Support deep link params for get-eligible
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Bot can link directly to recovery page.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- `/get-eligible?token=X&amount=Y&chain=Z`
- Pre-populates widget from URL params
- Works with Telegram startapp param

epics.title: Sprint 5: Demo Polish
epics.body:
**Goal**: Bot enforcement flow, demo chat setup, video recording.

**Target**: Day 5

**Acceptance**: Full demo flow works end-to-end, 4-minute video recorded.

tasks.title: Bot sends WARNING DM when ineligible
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Notify user of low balance.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Bot sends DM with current balance, required amount
- Includes "Fix with LiFi" button
- Button deep-links to Mini App /get-eligible

tasks.title: Bot can kick users from groups
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Enforce token gate.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Bot uses `banChatMember` API
- Sends kick notification DM before removal
- Optionally unbans after (allow rejoin when eligible)

tasks.title: Bot confirms eligibility after LiFi swap
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Celebrate user recovery.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- After re-check shows eligible
- Bot sends: "Detected X tokens, welcome back!"
- Includes link to rejoin group

tasks.title: Create public demo chat with pinned message
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Demo environment ready.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Public chat: "Best Crypto DAO"
- Pinned message with:
  - Intro + signup instructions
  - "Join Private Club" button
  - "Open Mini App" button
- Bot added as admin

tasks.title: Create private demo chat
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Gated group for demo.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Private chat: "BCD Holders Club"
- Join request mode enabled
- Bot as admin with kick permissions
- Pinned countdown message

tasks.title: Handle chat_join_request with eligibility check
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Gate group access.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- On join request, check user eligibility
- Approve if eligible
- Reject with message if not
- Message includes "Get Eligible" link

tasks.title: Deploy Mini App to Vercel
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Production deployment.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- apps/web deployed to Vercel
- Environment variables configured
- Custom domain (optional)
- Works in Telegram

tasks.title: Record 4-minute demo video
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Hackathon submission video.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Follow 12-scene script from FINAL_PLAN.md
- Admin setup → User rejected → Onboard → Join
- LiFi recovery flow
- Side overlays: architecture, prize alignment
- 1080p+, clear audio

epics.title: Sprint 6: Subscriptions
epics.body:
**Goal**: USDC membership payments for Arc/Circle partner prize.

**Target**: Stretch

**Acceptance**: Admin can configure USDC subscription gate, users can pay to join.

tasks.title: Add USDC membership deposit gate type
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Alternative to token balance gate.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- New gate type: `subscription`
- Config: USDC amount, payment period
- Stored in gates table

tasks.title: Integrate Circle/Arc SDK for payments
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Process USDC payments.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Circle SDK integrated
- User can pay USDC to join
- Payment verified on-chain
- Receipt stored

tasks.title: Subscription payment UI
tasks.body:
**Goal**: User-friendly payment flow.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Shows subscription price
- Connect wallet → Pay → Confirm
- Success grants access

tasks.title: Admin treasury view
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Admin sees collected payments.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Dashboard shows total collected
- List of payments with dates
- Withdrawal instructions

epics.title: Sprint 7: Misc Stretch
epics.body:
**Goal**: Additional features if time permits.

**Target**: Stretch

**Acceptance**: Enhanced functionality beyond core demo.

tasks.title: Automated cron for periodic eligibility checks
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Production-ready enforcement.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Convex scheduled function runs daily
- Checks all members of gated groups
- Triggers warning/kick flow for violations

tasks.title: Full organizations management UI
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Complete admin experience.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Edit org name
- Add/remove channels
- View all gates per org
- Delete org

tasks.title: Add WalletConnect for mobile Telegram
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Better mobile wallet support.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- WalletConnect v2 integrated
- Works in mobile Telegram app
- QR code flow for external wallets

tasks.title: EFP integration from ETH Identity Kit
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Social features.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Show follower/following counts
- Display EFP profile if available
- Optional: gate based on social graph

tasks.title: Demo control panel for live demos
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Easy demo manipulation.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Hidden `/demo` route
- Buttons: force eligible/ineligible
- Trigger warning, trigger kick
- Reset demo state

tasks.title: Admin analytics dashboard
tasks.body:
**Goal**: Insights for admins.

**Acceptance Criteria**
- Member count over time
- Eligible vs ineligible breakdown
- Recent joins/kicks
- Top token holders
